short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check with availability of Club Mahindra Resorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Club Mahindra Status Checker" is a browser extension that makes it easy to check room availability at Club Mahindra resorts. Just select your preferred dates and resorts, and the extension will show you the availability status in real time. It's a great way to see all your options at a glance and book your vacation without having to call or email each resort individually.

The extension is also really user-friendly. You can choose from a list of resorts by region or state, and the results are dynamically updated as you change your dates. Plus, the extension includes a login state indicator and resort data reset functionality, so you can always be sure that you're seeing the most up-to-date information.

If you're planning a vacation with Club Mahindra, the "Club Mahindra Status Checker" is a must-have. It's the easiest way to check availability and book your dream vacation.

Here are some of the benefits of using the Club Mahindra Status Checker:

It's easy to use.
It's up-to-date.
It shows you availability across multiple resorts.
It saves you time.
It's free.

If you're looking for a way to make booking your Club Mahindra vacation easier, the Club Mahindra Status Checker is the perfect tool for you.

Usage:
After installing, the extension will be available as a sidebar. If you are already logged in, just log out and login again for the extension to query on your behalf. If you close the extension you can open by clicking on the extension "Club Mahindra Status Checker".
